POLARIX

Introduction

Shao Zi Heng is a Chinese trainee under Warner Music China. He is a member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys.

He made his solo debut on October 10, 2024, with the digital single "Reckless."
